messages.title: My Plan
messages.content: To secure a better future for West Cornwall and Scilly. Re-elect Derek Thomas.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Continue with the close integration of health and care services, pressing for more NHS dentists and better diagnostic services closer to home.
Committed to ensure action is taken to cut harmful emissions and enhance nature to improve health and wellbeing.
Ensure that vital industries get the Government support they need to flourish while providing environmental benefits and food security.
Deliver a new fairer deal for small businesses, supporting them and promoting the majority employers providing local employment in Cornwall.
Support developers and planners to get quality homes built, empty buildings refurbished to help people find affordable homes.
Work to ensure the extra £23.5m from Government allows passengers to get to and from work and places to visit to determine the lifestyle they can afford on buses.

issues.environment: Committed to ensure action is taken to cut harmful emissions and enhance nature to improve health and wellbeing.
issues.health: Continue with the close integration of health and care services, pressing for more NHS dentists and better diagnostic services closer to home.
issues.labourEmployment: Deliver a new fairer deal for small businesses, supporting them and promoting the majority employers providing local employment in Cornwall.
issues.transport: Work to ensure the extra £23.5m from Government allows passengers to get to and from work and places to visit to determine the lifestyle they can afford on buses.

community.content: Support developers and planners to get quality homes built, empty buildings refurbished to help people find affordable homes.

examples: Work to ensure the extra £23.5m from Government allows passengers to get to and from work and places to visit to determine the lifestyle they can afford on buses.
Continue with the close integration of health and care services, pressing for more NHS dentists and better diagnostic services closer to home.
Committed to ensure action is taken to cut harmful emissions and enhance nature to improve health and wellbeing.
Ensure that vital industries get the Government support they need to flourish while providing environmental benefits and food security.
Deliver a new fairer deal for small businesses, supporting them and promoting the majority employers providing local employment in Cornwall.
Support developers and planners to get quality homes built, empty buildings refurbished to help people find affordable homes.
To secure a better future for West Cornwall and Scilly.
Commitment to improve health services along with more NHS dentists and diagnostic services closer to home.
Action to cut emissions and enhance nature locally.
Support for local fishing and farming industries.
Support for small businesses in Cornwall.
Support for developers and refurbishers in tackling housing needs.
Funding to improve local bus services.
